japanese:
いい買い物したわ。
あとは、ちょうどいい子が来てくれたら
完璧なんだけど。
translation:
I did some good shopping.
Now if only the right person could come along,
then it would be perfect.

japanese: 私たちだと微妙だもんねー。
translation: We wouldn't be so lucky.

japanese:
あれ？
二乃と四葉じゃないか。
translation: Hmm? Isn't that Nino and Yotsuba?

japanese: あら、うってつけの子が来たじゃない。
translation: Oh, the perfect person has arrived.

japanese: えっ？
translation: Huh?

japanese:
なんだよ。
なんか企んでんのか？
translation:
What's going on?
Are you planning something?
Ah...

japanese:
にしし！
勇ましいですねぇ上杉さん。
translation:
Hee-hee-hee!
You're quite brave, Uesugi-san.

japanese:
けど過保護すぎじゃない？
別に変なことなんてしないわよ。
translation:
But aren't you being overly cautious?
I'm not going to do anything weird.

japanese:
い、いや、二乃を疑ったりとか
そういうつもりじゃないんだが。
translation:
N-no, I didn't mean to suspect you
or anything, Nino.

japanese:
とっさに動いちゃったわけですか。
愛の力ですねぇ。
translation:
You acted on impulse.
The power of love, I see.

japanese:
あ、あの！
それよりも、私になにか？
translation:
U-um!
Anyway, is there anything you want from me?

japanese: はい、これをつけてみてほしくて。
translation: We want you to try this on.

japanese:
なんだこれ？
金属の棒にしか見えないが。
translation:
What's this?
It looks like a metal rod.

japanese:
これ、ジーファーっていう
沖縄伝統のかんざしなんですよ。
translation:
This is a traditional Okinawan hairpin,
called a 'jiifaa.'

japanese:
かんざしですか。
初めて見る形です。
translation:
A hairpin, huh?
It's the first time I've seen this shape.

japanese:
店で見かけて、一目惚れしちゃって。
というわけで五月、あんたの髪で試させてくれない？
translation:
I saw it at the store and fell in love with it.
So, Itsuki, can you let me try it on your hair?

japanese: いきなりですね！？
translation: That's a bit out of nowhere, isn't it?!

japanese:
いいじゃない。
あんたくらい長い髪のほうが見た目もいいし、
やりがいもあるのよ。
translation:
It's fine.
You have long hair, so it'll look good on you.
It'll be a fun challenge.

japanese:
はあ……。
構いませんが。
translation:
*sigh*
I guess it's okay.

japanese:
ここでいきなりできるもんなのか？
クシも鏡もないのに。
translation:
Is it really possible to do it here?
We don't even have a comb or a mirror.

japanese:
簡単にまとめるくらいならできるわ。
凝った結い方になると、
さすがにヘアピンなんかも必要だけど。
translation:
I can easily put it together.
If it's a more complicated style,
then we might need hairpins.

japanese: へー、そういうもんなのか。
translation: Oh, that's how it is.

japanese:
はい、できたわ！
なかなかいい仕上がりね。
translation:
Alright, I'm done!
It turned out really nice.

japanese: すげぇな、器用なもんだ。
translation: Wow, you're quite talented.

japanese:
可愛い～！
五月、似合うよ！
translation:
It's sooo cute!
Itsuki, it really suits you!

japanese: あ、ありがとうございます。
translation: Th-thank you.

japanese: あの……ふ、風太郎はどうですか？
translation: Um... F-Futaro, what do you think?

japanese: どうって……。
translation: What do I think...

japanese:
似合っていますか？
か……彼氏の意見が聞きたいんです。
translation:
Does it suit me?
I want to hear your opinion, as my...boyfriend.

japanese: え？
translation: Huh?

japanese: あら。
translation: My, oh my.

japanese: おお？
translation: Ooh?

japanese:
（か、彼氏って……。
　そんな聞き方してくるのは反則だろ……）
translation:
(B-boyfriend...
 Isn't that cheating, asking me that way?)

japanese:
ほらほら上杉さん！
彼女が答えて欲しそうですよ？　どうぞ！
translation:
Come on, Uesugi-san!
She wants your opinion! Do tell!

japanese: ……悪くないと思う。
translation: ...It's not bad.

japanese:
曖昧な言い方ですね。
似合っていないということですか？
translation:
That's pretty vague, ya know.
Does that mean it doesn't suit me?

japanese:
いや！　そういうわけじゃない！
見慣れてないから判断に困っただけで、
その……似合ってるぞ。
translation:
No! That's not what I mean! I just couldn't judge
well because I'm not used to seeing you with
your hair up... Um, you look good.

japanese: もう、それならそうと言ってください。
translation: Well, if that's the case, just say so.

japanese: すまん……。
translation: Sorry...

japanese: でも、ありがとうございます。
translation: But, thank you.

japanese:
なんか新鮮だ。
お前が髪をあげてるところなんて普段は見ないし。
translation:
It's kind of a fresh look.
I don't usually get to see you
with your hair up like that.

japanese:
それは答えになっていません。
似合っているのかを聞いたのに。
translation:
That doesn't answer my question
about whether it looks good on me or not.

japanese: あー、いや、その……。
translation: Ah, well, um...

japanese:
それとも、風太郎は
こういうのは好きじゃありませんか？
translation:
Or, do you not like this hairstyle,
Futaro?

japanese:
……いや、いいと思う。
似合ってるし。
translation:
...No, I think it's nice.
It suits you.

japanese:
そうですか。
では、たまには髪を結んでみますね。
translation:
Is that so.
Well, then I'll try wearing my hair up like this 
from time to time.

japanese: すごく似合うぞ。
translation: It looks really good on you.

japanese: ほ、本当ですか？
translation: R-really?

japanese:
本当だって。
その……。
translation:
Really.
I mean...

japanese: ちょっと、見惚れちまったくらいには。
translation: I'm a bit...entranced by it.

japanese: うひゃあ、すごいのろけ……。
translation: Oh my GOSH, that was so smooth...

japanese: 見てるこっちが恥ずかしいんですけど。
translation: It's kind of embarrassing to watch.

japanese:
う、うるさい！
俺は求められた意見を伝えただけだ！
translation:
Sh-shut up!
I was just giving her my opinion like she asked!

japanese:
で、では、たまにはこういう髪型もしてみますね。
風太郎の前でだけ……。
translation:
A-anyway, I'll try this hairstyle occasionally.
But only in front of you, Futaro...

japanese: お、おう、そうか。
translation: O-oh, is that so?

japanese:
ありがとうございました二乃。
これ、返しますね。
translation:
Thanks, Nino.
I'll give this back now.

japanese:
ずいぶんとご機嫌ね。
フー君に褒められたのがそんなに嬉しいのかしら。
translation:
You seem pretty happy.
Is it because Fu-kun complimented you?

japanese: そ、それは……。
translation: W-well...

japanese: 嬉しくて当然だよねー。
translation: Of course. That's only natural, right?

japanese: ……はい。
translation: ...Yeah.

japanese: じゃ、次、フー君も試してみる？
translation: Alright, you want to try it next, Fu-kun?

japanese: 俺の髪の長さを見てから言え。
translation: You tell me. Look at the length of my hair.

japanese: さあ、気合いで伸ばしてみましょう！
translation: Fine, we'll just stretch it out!

japanese: 無茶言うな！
translation: Don't be ridiculous!

japanese: 髪を伸ばした上杉君……。
translation: Uesugi-kun with long hair...

japanese:
……思い出したんだが、
二乃、お前、ロン毛の俺は気持ち悪いだとか
言ってたよな？
translation:
...I just remembered, Nino, 
weren't you the one that said long hair would look gross on me?

japanese:
ああ、そんな話もしたわね。
もしかしてフー君、根に持ってる？
translation:
Oh, I did say that, didn't I?
Could it be that you're still holding a grudge?

japanese:
いいや？
ただ俺は自分のポテンシャルを信じてるからな。
ロン毛が似合う可能性はゼロじゃない！
translation:
No, not really. I just believe in my potential.
There's a possibility that long hair could suit me!

japanese:
そうですよね！
似合うと思います！
translation: That's right! I think it would look good on you!

japanese: おわっ！？
translation: WHAAA?!

japanese:
うえす、風太郎には無限の可能性があるはず！
髪を風になびかせることだってできます！
translation:
Uesu%p-2;――%p; Futaro, there's infinite potential in you.
You could even let your hair flow in the wind!

japanese: なびかせるのは誰でもできるわよ。
translation: Anyone can do that.

japanese:
そ、そうではなくて！
ええと、その……。
translation:
N-no, that's not what I mean!
Umm...uhh...

japanese: と、とにかく似合うと思います！
translation: A-anyway, I think it would suit you!

japanese: うーん、そうなのかも？
translation: Hmm, it just might, you know?

japanese: そうに違いありませんっ！
translation: It definitely would!

japanese:
（五月、なんで俺の髪の話で
　そんなに熱くなってるんだ……？）
translation: (Why is Itsuki getting so worked up over my hair...?)
